item.title: DeLorean Time Circuits
item.author: Luca Cipressi
item.description:
BTTF

This is a semi-serious rendition of the story behind making this project:

A replica of the time machine circuits from the Back To The Future blockbuster equipped with a talking alarm clock.

Apart from actual time travel, which might be even possible depending on your time-zone, internet provider and your skills in creating your own flux-capacitor, it works as a nice talking alarm clock with the most famous quotes from the original movie.
